page.title: 14RECREATION IN HIGHAM FERRERS
page.content:
In Higham Ferrers there is a general feeling that there is not enough recreational facilities available for people of any age.
In Higham Ferrers there are two Pubs, a park, a good library and two Youth Clubs. In Chelveston and Caldecott there is only a Pub. People from these villages have to visit other places for their recreation, which can be a problem as there is no regular bus service.
The Ferrers School offers recreational facilities to young people. There are disco's for pupils, a Youth Club and a Pop-In where young people can pop-in for a chat and a drink with their friends.
